<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="PartIII">PART III</a></font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item10">Item 10</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Directors, Executive Officers and Corporate Governance.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">As of December&#160;31, 2010, the Board of Directors of the Company consisted of William S. Winston, Herman L. Davis, Belinda Whitfield, Addie Husbands and Jay Plourde.&#160;&#160;Addie Husbands resigned from the Board on February&#160;29, 2012.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The following sets forth the background and experience of the Company&#8217;s Board of Directors and senior management team.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">William S. (Bill) Winston</font> (66) is the Chairman of the Board of Directors and Chief Executive Officer of the Company.&#160;&#160;In 1989, Dr. Winston founded the Living Word Christian Center, a 17,000-member church located in Forest Park, Illinois, and he continues to serve as its Pastor.&#160;&#160;The Living Word Christian Center has a broad range of entities including a Bible Training Center, a School of Ministry and Missions, the Joseph School of Business, the Forest Park Plaza shopping mall, the Living Word Christian Academy and many others.&#160;&#160;Dr.&#160;Winston also hosts the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Believer&#8217;s Walk of Faith </font>television and radio broadcast, which reaches more than 80 million households nationwide and overseas.&#160;&#160;Prior to joining the ministry, Dr.&#160;Winston worked for IBM Corporation, where he rose from a marketing representative to regional marketing manager in IBM&#8217;s Midwest region.&#160;&#160;In that position, he was responsible for more than $35 million in sales revenues per year.&#160;&#160;Prior to joining IBM, Dr.&#160;Winston served as a fighter pilot in the U.S. Air Force, where he received numerous awards and medals in recognition of his superior skills and accomplishments.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Herman L. Davis </font>(59) is the Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer, Secretary, Treasurer and a director of the Company and the President, the Chief Operating Officer and a director of the Bank.&#160;&#160;Mr.&#160;Davis has 35 years of commercial banking experience, all of which has been with financial institutions in the State of Illinois.&#160;&#160;Prior to joining the Company, he served as senior vice president and cashier of Advance Bancorp, Inc. (now a part of Charter One Bank) from 1997 to 2003.&#160;&#160;Previously, he served as Senior Vice President of Lending and senior vice president of operations for Independence Bank of Chicago and Drexel National Bank of Chicago (which later became part of Shore Bank of Chicago) from 1987 to 1997.&#160;&#160;As senior vice president of Advance Bancorp, Inc., Mr.&#160;Davis&#8217;s responsibilities included branch operations, regulatory supervision, data processing, consumer lending, credit administration, security, budgeting and data processing.&#160;&#160;Prior to joining Advance Bancorp, Inc., Mr.&#160;Davis served as vice president of Corporate Services for Shore Bank of Chicago from 1996 to 1997, where he was responsible for growing the asset base of the bank through middle-market services.&#160;&#160;He joined Independence Bank and Drexel National Bank as senior vice president and supervised the growth of the bank&#8217;s loan portfolio with community lending and specialized services.&#160;&#160;He also served as a nonvoting member of the Board of Directors of Independence Bank from 1987 to 1996.&#160;&#160;Since 2003, Mr.&#160;Davis has been involved with the Company and its efforts to organize or acquire a bank.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Addie D. Husbands </font>(59) was a director of the Company and of the Bank from September&#160;28, 2010 until February&#160;29, 2012.&#160;&#160;Ms. Husbands, a retired transportation official, served in various capacities in a regional and national railroad company through the superintendent level from 1988 to 2009.&#160;&#160;During this time, Ms.&#160;Husbands mentored numerous subordinates and oversaw various departments.&#160;&#160;Prior to entering the transportation industry, Ms.&#160;Husbands was employed by American National Bank and Trust Company.&#160;&#160;With more than 30 years of experience in the transportation industry, Ms.&#160;Husbans has a strong background in management and operations.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Jay C. Plourde </font>(57) is a director of the Company and of the Bank and an Executive Director and Head of Equities at CLSA Asia Pacific Markets, Ltd. in New York, New York, a brokerage and investment group, where he has worked since 2007.&#160;&#160;Mr. Plourde was appointed to the Board on</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">83</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt"><a href="#TOC">Table of Contents</a></font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">September&#160;28, 2010.&#160;&#160;Before joining CLSA Asia Pacific Markets, Inc., Mr.&#160;Plourde founded, and was Chief Executive Officer of, SCIUS Capital.&#160;&#160;Prior to founding SCIUS Capital in 2000, Mr.&#160;Plourde held several executive positions with Credit Suisse First Boston, Credit Lyonnais and CBS Publishing Group.&#160;&#160;In 1987, he helped establish and develop a research and publishing start-up, 13D Research Inc., and co-founded the 21st Century Digital Industries Fund, L.P. in 1992.&#160;&#160;He currently serves on the board of EAI Corporation.&#160;&#160;Previously he served on the boards of Atlantic Stem Cell Technologies, HydroFuel systems Inc., Cold Spring Harbor Research Laboratory and Filter Control Technologies.&#160;&#160;Through his prior work in the investment banking industry and current investment firm positions, Mr.&#160;Plourde brings to the Board a diverse array of business experiences and extensive knowledge of corporate governance matters.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Belinda Whitfield </font>(49) is a director of the Company and of the Bank, a principal of Whitfield and Associates LLC and Treasurer of the Living Word Christian Center.&#160;&#160;Ms. Whitfield was appointed to the Board on March&#160;25, 2008.&#160;&#160;Before Whitfield and Associates, Ms.&#160;Whitfield rose through the ranks at Heitman Properties Ltd., a real<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>estate management company, leaving in 1996 at the manager level.&#160;&#160;She currently provides a range of accounting and consulting services to multiple clients, concentrating on faith-based organizations.&#160;&#160;Through her prior work in the real estate industry and current accounting firm position, Ms.&#160;Whitfield brings to the Board a diverse array of business experience and extensive knowledge of accounting and auditing matters <font style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff; DISPLAY: inline">and is a particularly valuable resource to the members of Company&#8217;s financial management</font>.&#160;&#160;Ms.&#160;Whitfield was appointed President and CEO of the Bank on January&#160;3, 2012.&#160;&#160;Ms.&#160;Whitfield is managing the Bank as the Company works to add capital and turn around its banking operations.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">On December&#160;14, 2010, John Sorensen, the Company&#8217;s President and CEO, tendered his resignation.&#160;&#160;Effective upon his resignation, the board of directors appointed William S. Winston as Chief Executive Officer.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section&#160;16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Beginning in July 2011, the Board of Directors of the Company voluntarily decided to begin to purchase shares from other holders using their monthly Board fees for these purchases.&#160;&#160;As a result of this decision, certain Board members have purchased shares of the Company&#8217;s common stock, which were not reported on Form 4 or Form 5.&#160;&#160;William Winston, the Company&#8217;s Chairman and CEO, or entities affiliated with Dr. Winston purchased 200 shares at $10 per share on July&#160;7, 2011, 20 shares at $10 per share on November&#160;14, 2011, 10 shares at $10 per share on February&#160;21, 2012 and 10 shares at $10 per share on March&#160;23, 2012.&#160;&#160;Herman Davis purchased 20 shares at $10 per share on November&#160;14, 2011, 10 shares at $10 per share on February&#160;21, 2012 and 10 shares at $10 per share on March&#160;23, 2012.&#160;&#160;Belinda Whitfield purchased 20 shares at $10 per share on November&#160;14, 2011, 10 shares at $10 per share on February&#160;21, 2012 and 10 shares at $10 per share on March&#160;23, 2012.&#160;&#160;Addie Husbands purchased 40 shares at $10 per share on November&#160;14, 2011 and 10 shares at $10 per share on February&#160;21, 2012.</font></font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></div>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Code of Ethics</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company has&#160;adopted a Code of Ethics.&#160;&#160;This code applies to the directors of the Company.&#160; A copy of the Code of Ethics is filed as an exhibit to this report.</font></div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item11">Item 11</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Executive Compensation.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Summary Compensation Table</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The following table summarizes the compensation earned during the years ended December&#160;31, 2010 and 2009 by the persons who at the Company held the positions of &#8220;Principal Executive Officer&#8221; and &#8220;Principal Financial Officer.&#8221;&#160;&#160;No other executive officer of the Company or the Bank earned and/or received total compensation in excess of $100,000 in 2010 and 2009.&#160;&#160;</font></div>

<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">(1)</font></font></td>
<td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="9%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">127,200</font></td>
<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></td>
</tr></table>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">____________<br>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Mr. Sorensen submitted his resignation on December&#160;16, 2010.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Consists of $1,200 in director fees and $6,000 automobile allowance.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Mr.&#160;Davis is also eligible for the 401(k) match of up to 3 percent of his base salary.&#160;&#160;There are no bonus plans or stock options of any kind available to the named executive officers.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company has not established any plans that provide for payments or other benefits at, following or in connection with retirement of its named executive officers.&#160;&#160;At present, the Company does not have employment agreements with any of its named executive officers.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company has not established any equity or non-equity incentive plans for its named executive officers, although it may do so in the future.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">At the present time, the only element of compensation is the base salary, director fees and a 3 percent 401(k) match.&#160;&#160;As of the date hereof, the Company has not established a compensation committee of the Board of Directors.&#160;&#160;The functions that would be performed by such committee are performed by our Board of Directors.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Since the Company has not established any incentive compensation programs and has only paid base salaries and automobile allowances in the past, management believes that there are no compensation and incentive risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on the Company.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Director Compensation</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Company and Bank directors each receive $100 per meeting for attendance at each Board of Directors meeting.&#160;&#160;The Company intends to form committees of the Board of Directors, and additional fees may be established for service on such committees.&#160;&#160;The following table sets forth the compensation paid by the Company and the Bank to each of the Company&#8217;s directors in 2010.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">*&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Mr. Sorensen&#8217;s positions with the Board of Directors of the Company and the Bank were terminated when he resigned from the Company on December&#160;16, 2010.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">**&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Ms. Husbands resigned from the Board of Directors on February&#160;29, 2012.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item12">Item 12</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners and Management and Related Stockholder Matters.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The following table sets forth information as to the Company&#8217;s common stock beneficially owned as of March&#160;31, 2012 by (1)&#160;each director and named executive officer, (2)&#160;all directors and executive officers of the Company and the Bank as a group and (3)&#160;persons known to the Company to be the beneficial owner of 5 percent or more of the Company&#8217;s common stock.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div align="left">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160; </font></td>

<tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(1)</font></div>
</td>
<td>

<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company is not aware of any other person owning five percent or more of the Company&#8217;s outstanding common stock other than William S. Winston.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item13">Item 13</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Certain Relationships and Related Transactions, and Director Independence.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Certain Relationships and Related Transactions</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company and the Bank have conducted, and expect to continue the practice of conducting, banking transactions in the ordinary course of business with their directors, executive officers, employees, and affiliates or family members of such persons, on substantially the same terms, including interest rates and collateral, as those prevailing at the time for comparable loans with persons not related to the Company involving no more than the normal risk of collectability or other unfavorable features.&#160;&#160;Any loans made to this group of persons or entities comply with Regulation O as promulgated by the Federal Reserve Board, which includes limiting the aggregate amount that can be loaned to the Bank&#8217;s directors and officers.&#160;&#160;At December&#160;31, 2010, the Bank did not have any loans outstanding to any member of this group.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt"><a href="#TOC">Table of Contents</a></font></div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company issued senior convertible notes that pay interest at maturity at a fixed rate of 8.00% per annum.&#160;&#160;The scheduled maturity of the notes is twelve months from the issue date and are convertible under certain circumstances into shares of common stock at a conversion ratio based upon the book value of the Company&#8217;s stock at 1.5 times the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">dollar amount of the debt.&#160;&#160;The decision of whether to convert the senior convertible notes into the common stock of the Company is at the </font></font></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">option <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">of the Company</font>.&#160;&#160;In 2010, certain notes were converted upon maturity at the Company&#8217;s option to 75,678 shares of the Company&#8217;s common stock.&#160;&#160;As of December 31, 2010, the Company had $365,425 issued and outstanding senior convertible notes, including $230,425 to William Winston, the Company&#8217;s Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.</font></font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Subsequent to December 31, 2010, the Company issued a total of $335,000 of the senior convertible notes to Dr. Winston in a series of transactions.&#160;&#160;As of March 31, 2012, the Company had $675,425 of its senior convertible notes issued and outstanding, including $565,425 issued and outstanding to Dr. Winston, $340,425 of which will mature in 2012 and $335,000 will mature in 2013.&#160;&#160;As of March 31, 2012, the aggregate amount of the outstanding notes is convertible into 587,871 shares of the Company&#8217;s common stock at maturity based upon the book value of the Company&#8217;s stock at 1.5 times the&#160;dollar amount of the debt.</font></font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">In addition, subsequent to December&#160;31, 2010, thru March&#160;31, 2012 as described above, the Company issued a total of $575,000 of Preferred Stock to Dr.&#160;Winston and The Forest Park Plaza LLC, an entity controlled by Dr.&#160;Winston.</font></font></div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Independence of Members of the Board of Directors</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company has not previously registered shares under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.&#160;&#160;However, the Company&#8217;s Form 10 Registration Statement pursuant to Section&#160;12(g) of the Securities Exchange Act, as amended, was effective beginning January&#160;14, 2011.&#160;&#160;The Company&#8217;s shares are not currently listed on any national securities exchange or other automated quotation system, nor is the Company applying for the initial listing of its securities on any such exchange or system.&#160;&#160;The Company, therefore, is not presently governed by specific corporate governance guidelines or rules imposing independence requirements on the composition of the Board of Directors and its committees.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item14">Item 14</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Principal Accountant Fees and Services.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Company has paid McGladrey&#160;&amp; Pullen LLP the following amounts:&#160;&#160;$139,750 for 2009 audit work and assistance in preparation of its Form&#160;10, $9,300 for preparation of its 2009 tax returns and $100,983 for its 2010 audit work.&#160;&#160;The Company has agreed to pay&#160;$40,000 more for the 2010 audit work and $5,000 for the 2010 tax return.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="PartIV">PART IV</a></font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><a name="Item15">Item 15</a>.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Exhibits, Financial Statement Schedules.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(a)(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The financial statements required to be included in this Form 10-K appear under Item&#160;8 herein.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(a)(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;All financial statement schedules for the Company required by Item 8 and Item 15 of this Form 10-K are omitted because of the absence of conditions under which they are required, or because the information is set forth in the consolidated financial statements or the notes thereto.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(a)(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;See the Exhibit Index below which is incorporated herein by reference.</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

Winston<font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">William S. Winston</font></div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

<div style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
